name: Running With Santa
description:
Save Christmas and dive into the holiday mood with the best running game of the holiday season!

Hurry up and get running with Santa! Save Christmas from becoming a complete disaster!
Santa’s slay has been struck by a lightning and the jolly old man is now in big trouble!
Help him save the holiday spirit and find all presents that were lost in the accident, by guiding his run around the snowy North Pole village’s streets.
Santa needs your help with finding his way through the icy course and retrieving all of the presents that fell off the sled in the accident. Hurry-up and collect all lost gifts from the streets of Santa’s village as quickly as possible! Make sure that all good kids receive their presents just in time for the holiday.

Join the gift hunt and have the Christmas adventure of your life!

Snowy bridges to cross, tricky icicles to avoid, deadly gaps to jump over - those are only a few of the obstacles that you will have to deal with, while running with Santa. Try to collect all of the presents that you see on your Christmas dash.

The various bonuses and power-ups that you will stumble upon while running through the snowy village’s streets are there to help you with your mission. Run faster, jump further and collect more lost gifts, meant for good kids from all around the world. The more presents you retrieve, the easier your mission becomes! Equip your character with a blazing fast jet pack or just pick up a magnet and make sure that no gift is left behind!

Who is your favorite character?
Do you like playing with Santa or you prefer the little dwarf character? It is up to you!
Join our facebook community and let us know which dwarf or reindeer character you want to run with next!

You can’t get enough of Santa’s little helper dwarfs?
Just vote for Dopey, Grumpy, Doc, Bashful, Sneezy, Sleepy, or Happy!
Which of Santa’s reindeer is your favorite?
Vote for Dasher, Dancer, Prancer, Vixen, Comet, Cupid, Donner or Blitzen!

This is your game so have your say and have it your way!

What we can promise is that you will fall in love with our great Christmas runner, once you glance at the stunning 3D graphics and hear the enchanting Christmas Carol soundtrack.
